abstract: Stifel Financial, the brokerage house based in St. Louis, said Monday that it had reached a merger agreement with Thomas Weisel Partners worth about $300 million.
snippet: Stifel Financial, the brokerage house based in St. Louis, said Monday that it had reached a merger agreement with Thomas Weisel Partners worth about $300 million.
lead_paragraph: Stifel Financial, the brokerage house based in St. Louis, said Monday that it had reached a merger agreement with Thomas Weisel Partners worth about $300 million.

headline.main: Stifel Financial and Thomas Weisel Merge
